text: Shady Records is an American hip hop record label founded in 1999 by rapper Eminem and his manager Paul Rosenberg, after the highly successful release of Eminem's The Slim Shady LP. Both serve as the label's presidents. It had artists such as 50 Cent, Obie Trice, and Yelawolf. title: Shady Records
